table_summary: This table provides a summary of the financial performance of various industries, measured by the Return on Equity (ROE). It includes both unadjusted ROE and ROE adjusted for Research and Development (R&D) expenses. Additionally, the table lists the number of firms in each industry, which helps in understanding the sample size for the ROE calculations.
